name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Message israeli number in WhatsApp App

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Send message to the selected Israeli mobile number in the WhatsApp Windows App (assuming you have installed the WhatsApp app)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Opens the WhatsApp Windows App ready to send a new message to the israeli mobile number contained in the text selected in the current web page.

Note: this addon can only be used after installation of the WhatsApp Application on your PC!
